original_text: He listened to Paul speaking. And Paul, looking intently at him and seeing that he had faith to be made well,
korean_text: 바울이 말하는 것을 듣거늘 바울이 주목하여 구원 받을 만한 믿음이 그에게 있는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and seeing that he had faith to be made well,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 낫게 될 믿음이 있는 것을 보고
